Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.action.server.ServerController

package it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.action.server.ServerController
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ClientControllerAction
    Action that allows a client request to be handled by the ServerController.
    ConnectToGameAction
    Action that allows a client to connect to a specified game match.
    CreateMatchAction
    Action that allows a client to create a new game match with the specified flight level and player count.
    GetAvailableMatchesAction
    Action that allows a client to request the current list of available matches.
    PingAction
    Action that allows a client to ping the server to keep the connection alive.
    RegisterRMISessionAction
    Action that registers an RMI session for a connecting client.
    RegisterSocketSessionAction
    Action that allows a client to register a socket-based session.
